author: Angela Watercutter
title: Movie Theater Chains Reckon With an Uncertain Future
description: Cinemark is trying to plan for a July reopening, and AMC Theatres could be facing bankruptcy as the pandemic keeps audiences away.
content:
Hello, and welcome to today's edition of The Monitor, WIREDs entertainment news roundup. This time around, we're looking at theater chains amid the coronavirus pandemic, the new Dune adaptation, and a new Mandalorian documentary series. Let's dive in.
